verses.text:
Come back to Jesus, wandering soul,
Come back to Jesus now;
He's waiting to receive you,
With love upon his brow.

Come back to Jesus, weary heart,
Come back to Jesus now;
He'll heal your every sorrow,
And smooth your troubled brow.

Come back to Jesus, guilty one,
Come back to Jesus now;
He'll wash away your crimson stains,
And make you white as snow.

Come back to Jesus, dying soul,
Come back to Jesus now;
He's the resurrection and the life,
To him all power is given.

Come back to Jesus, lost one,
Come back to Jesus now;
He came to seek and save the lost,
And he will save you now.

Come back, come back, come back to Jesus,
Come back to Jesus now;
He's calling you so tenderly,
O come to Jesus now.
